  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Appointment
    Model for appointment objects.
    AppointmentFormController
    Controller for the add/edit appointment form.
    AppointmentsController
    Controller for the appointments view.
    Contact
    Model for Contact objects.
    Country
    Model for Country objects.
    Customer
    Model for Customer objects.
    CustomerFormController
    Controller for the Customer form.
    CustomersController
    Controller for the customers view.
    DBAppointments
    Handles database queries for appointment objects.
    DBConnection
    Manages database connection.
    DBContacts
    Handles database queries for contact objects.
    DBCountries
    Performs SQL queries on the Countries table.
    DBCustomers
    This class performs SQL queries on the customers table.
    DBFirstLevelDivisions
    This class performs SQL queries on the first_level_divisions table.
    DBPassword
    Git ignored class to prevent password from being uploaded to GitHub.
    DBUsers
    Handles database queries for User objects.
    FirstLevelDivision
    Model for FirstLevelDivision objects.
    LoginController
    Controller for the login form.
    Main
    Application Main class
    ReportsController
    Controller for the reports view.
    User
    Model for User objects.
